title: Dan Snyder Hires Bank to Explore Sale of Washington Commanders
description: Daniel and Tanya Snyder, the embattled owners of the N.F.L. team, announced they would seek “potential transactions” related to the sale of the team.
dc:creator: Ken Belson and Jenny Vrentas
media:credit: Geoff Burke/USA Today Sports, via Reuters
media:description: Daniel Snyder helped announce the rebranding of the team in February 2022 as his wife and team co-owner, Tanya, looked on.
